title: Emotionally attuned managers are better at judging workgroup effectiveness

title_detail.value: Emotionally attuned managers are better at judging workgroup effectiveness

summary: Experts show for first time that -- even on the fly -- a manager who can read emotions in others well can better evaluate a working group's performance.

summary_detail.value: Experts show for first time that -- even on the fly -- a manager who can read emotions in others well can better evaluate a working group's performance.
